external_members: The external users have more permissions than project members.

roles_permissions.project_administrators_explanation: Project admins can access to the project settings and move things around, activate modules, invite people and mostly everything else.

modal_permissions.potential_permission_conflicts_explanati: Are you sure you want to give more permissions to the public than to project members? It may be totally on purpose, but, just in case, take a look at this.

members.title: Project members
members.no_pending: There are no pending invitations to accept.

revoke.question: Cancel invitation to {user}
revoke.description: The invitation will be no longer valid. You can invite them again if you want.

members.admin_dialog_title: Projects must have at least one admin.
members.admin_dialog_description: Assign another admin first and try again.
members.no_longer_admin: You are no longer admin on this project.
members.warning_change_role: Changing your role will remove your permissions as admin
